com.automatic.android.sdk

Class ELMSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.automatic.android.sdk.ELMSocket

  • public class ELMSocket
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to handle communication between the Link's ELM237 emulation and a 3rd-party app. Created by duncan on 8/7/15.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  ELMSocket.CommandCallback
      Callback for ELM command response
      static interface  ELMSocket.ElmSocketCallback 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BluetoothSocket getSocket()
      Get the BT socket that communicates with Automatic adapter
      void sendCommand(java.lang.String command)
      Send an ELM command to the adapter, the client must implement ELMSocket.CommandCallback and call setCommandCallback(CommandCallback) in order to get the response.
      void setCommandCallback(ELMSocket.CommandCallback callback)
      Sets streaming command callback

        public void sendCommand(java.lang.String command)
        Send an ELM command to the adapter, the client must implement ELMSocket.CommandCallback and call setCommandCallback(CommandCallback) in order to get the response.
